mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BEDU_REPLY( REPLY_NUM, USER_NAME, CONTENT, COMM_NUM, REPLY_DATE, REG_DATE, REG_ID )VALUES( BEDU_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{userName}, #{content}, #{commNum}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{regId} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT REPLY_NUM AS replyNum, CONTENT, REPLY_DATE AS replyDate, u.USER_NAME AS userName FROM T_BEDU_REPLY r LEFT JOIN T_BEDU_USER u ON r.USER_NAME = u.USER_ID WHERE COMM_NUM = #{commNum} ORDER BY REPLY_NUM DESC)
